meanings.definition: A group of people with a shared interest or identity.
meanings.sent1: In our school, the soccer team forms one of the ingroups.
meanings.sent2: The ingroups at the library often gather for book discussions.
meanings.sent3: The ingroups at the park had a picnic together.
meanings.sent4: The ingroups in the neighborhood are like puzzle pieces fitting together.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the ingroups makes you feel connected and understood.

meanings.definition: The members of a group who share a common identity or purpose.
meanings.sent1: At the company, the ingroups work closely on projects.
meanings.sent2: The ingroups in the choir harmonize beautifully during performances.
meanings.sent3: The ingroups at the party all wore matching hats.
meanings.sent4: The ingroups in the community are the heart of our town.
meanings.sent5: Belonging to the ingroups gives a sense of belonging and support.
